Outlook.logoutQuestion: Would you like to sign out of your eXo Platform intranet?
Outlook.homeOpenPortal: Open the intranet page in a new window
Outlook.homeNoActionsAvailable: No actions are available in this context
Outlook.saveAttachmentDescription: Here you can save attachments as documents inside the intranet.
Outlook.selectAttachmentDescription: Selected attachments will be saved inside the target space.
Outlook.commentAttachmentDescription: This message will be included in the activity stream post about the saved attachment.
Outlook.selectSaveSpaceDescription: Select the space where the attachments will Sbe saved
Outlook.pathInfoSaveDescription: The target folder within the space in which your attachments will be saved.
Outlook.savedClickToOpen: Click a file in the list below to open it inside the intranet
Outlook.enterFolderNameAndCreate: Provide a name for this new folder and then click "Add".
Outlook.addAttachmentDescription: Attach documents from the intranet to this message.
Outlook.attachingDocumentsDescription: Selected documents will be attached to the message.
Outlook.addedAttachment: The documents were successfully attached to the message
Outlook.addedPartiallyAttachment: Some documents were not attached to the message, see details below each file
Outlook.convertToStatusDescription: This message can be converted to a new post on the activity stream. By default, it will be shared as a new status update on your personal activity stream. Choosing a target space will post it on the space's activity stream instead.
Outlook.activityTargetSpaceDescription: If selected, your message will be posted on the space's activity stream.
Outlook.activityTitleDescription: This will be the title of the activity stream post
Outlook.activityTextDescription: This will be the content of the activity stream post
Outlook.convertToStatusError: Error converting the message to an activity stream post
Outlook.convertedToUserActivity: The message was successfully posted in your personal activity stream.
Outlook.convertedToSpaceActivity: The message was successfully posted in the {SPACE_NAME} activity stream
Outlook.convertToWikiDescription: This message can be converted to a wiki page. By default, this will be a new page in the general intranet wiki. Choosing a target space will create the page in the space's wiki instead.
Outlook.wikiPageTitleDescription: The title of the wiki page
Outlook.wikiPageTextDescription: This will be the body of the wiki page
Outlook.wikiTargetSpaceDescription: If selected, your message will be converted to a page in the space wiki.
Outlook.convertingToWiki: Converting the message to a wiki page...
Outlook.convertedToUserWiki: The page was successfully created in the general wiki of the intranet.
Outlook.convertedToSpaceWiki: The page was successfully created in the {SPACE_NAME} wiki.
Outlook.convertToForumDescription: This message can be converted to a new forum topic. You need to choose a target space where it will be created.
Outlook.forumTopicNameDescription: This will be the name of your forum topic
Outlook.forumTopicTextDescription: This will be the body of the forum post
Outlook.forumTargetSpaceDescription: Your message will be converted to a forum topic in the space's forum.
Outlook.convertingToForum: Converting the message to a forum topic...
Outlook.convertedToUserForum: The topic was successfully created in the general forums of the intranet.
Outlook.convertedToSpaceForum: The topic was successfully created in the {SPACE_NAME} forum.
Outlook.postStatusDescription: Post a status update on the activity stream. By default, it will be posted on your personal stream. Choosing a target space will post it on the space's activity stream instead.
Outlook.activityMessageDescription: This will be the new status update posted on the activity stream.
Outlook.postedToUserActivity: Your activity was successfully posted on your personal activity stream.
Outlook.postedToSpaceActivity: Your activity was successfully posted on the {SPACE_NAME} activity stream.
Outlook.startDiscussionDescription: Start a new discussion in the forum of a space.
Outlook.forumTopicTextPlaceholder: Type in your new forum post here
Outlook.forumNewTopicTargetSpaceDescription: Your new forum discussion will be posted in the space's forum.
Outlook.startedTopicInUserForum: The new forum discussion was successfully created in the general forums of the intranet.
Outlook.startedTopicInSpaceForum: The discussion was successfully created in the {SPACE_NAME} forum.
Outlook.searchDescription: Search inside the intranet for content such as documents, wiki pages, discussions, etc.
Outlook.searchQueryPlaceholder: Type in your search query here
Outlook.searchQueryDescription: You can use one or several keywords for document names and metadata, body text, etc.
Outlook.searchTargetSpaceDescription: If selected, the search will be limited to the content of a space (space documents, wiki pages, discussions, etc.).

messages.folderHasNoPath: Error selecting the folder: path not found. Try refreshing the page.
messages.fileHasNoPath: Error selecting the file: path not found.
messages.nothingSavedTryAgain: Sorry, nothing was saved. Please try submitting the form again or contact your administrator.
messages.gettingTokenError: Error getting the access token for the email server
messages.attachmentNotSelected: No attachment selected. Please select at least one attachment and then submit the form again.
messages.menuNameUndefined: Menu name is undefined. Please contact your administrator.
messages.youDontHaveSpaces: It looks like you are not a member of any space.
messages.convertToStatusError: Error converting message to an activity stream post
messages.messageIdNotFound: Could not find the ID of the message
